categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Laser Company was a clone trooper company of the Grand Army of the Republic that served under Jedi General Kit Fisto during the Clone Wars. Around the second year of the war, the unit was severely depleted in an encounter on Kessel, with trooper Checkers being the only clone survivor. Although the unit was replenished with new troops, Checkers chose to be transferred to Torrent Company to serve under Clone Captain CT-7567.
Laser Company was first mentioned in Clone Wars Gambit: Stealth, a novel written by Karen Miller and published in 2009.
